definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
student of a senior high school

sentences.english: Overall, the students can not be blindly Starchaser.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，中學生不能盲目追星。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the AIDS prevention knowledge among middle-school students in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解農村中學生預防艾滋病知識水平。

sentences.english: And it is also the responsibility of our Beijing high school students!
sentences.chinese: 也是我們北京中學生的一種思想境界和追求。

sentences.english: The students of the global system are now doing better than their teachers.
sentences.chinese: 當前的全球系統中學生比老師做得更好。

sentences.english: The fourth part, the middle-school student psychological barrier forms reason analysis.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，中學生心理障礙形成的原因。

sentences.english: The textbooks for middle school students have been reset.
sentences.chinese: 中學生教科書現已重新排版。

sentences.english: The third part concerns the demands to the teaching of reading for a healthy personality.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分談養成中學生和諧個性對閱讀教學的要求。

sentences.english: Thirdly it is to lead the students to magnificent self-culture.
sentences.chinese: 三是引導中學生進行高尚道德人格的自我修養。

sentences.english: His daughter, Emily, 16 is a junior in high school.
sentences.chinese: 他的女兒艾米麗芳齡16歲，是一名中學生。

sentences.english: Now, we are middle school students.
A high school student walking with her father, who is holding her bag.
sentences.chinese: 一名高中學生與她的父親，父親幫她拿着書包。

sentences.english: Shangyuan is my grandson; he is a middle school student.
sentences.chinese: 上元是我的孫子，他是一名中學生。

sentences.english: I am a lovely middle school girl.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個可愛的女中學生。

sentences.english: The third chapter, implementation of middle-school student life education.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，中學生生命教育的實施。

sentences.english: Even high school students have gotten in on the action of disproving this myth.
sentences.chinese: 甚至也有中學生加入到戳穿這個謬論的隊伍中來。

sentences.english: Some middle school students are window-shopping outside the department store.
sentences.chinese: 一些中學生在百貨商店外面看櫥窗。
